name: Letters in Red (Dennis Boersma)
description:
Letters in Red

First Person Horror Adventure

This game is mostly about the scary, helpless feeling of being stranded in an unknown haunted hotel. You won't find any weapons, but instead you must search for clues and find your way out. The car is waiting for you outside the gate where you left it, only how to get back there?

Contains many secrets, a hidden world and some unexpected routes

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2014

  •  3 months time 
  • 6 game students
  • 15 audio students 
  • 1 programmer
